title:LocalizableTitle.title:SummaryShort: This animation is about THE FEELING, THE FLOW.

title:LocalizableTitle.title:SummaryShort: The oldest hereditary monarchy in the world, its post-war role and the issue of gender has caused much soul searching in recent times.
title:LocalizableTitle.title:SummaryLong: The oldest hereditary monarchy in the world, its post-war role and the issue of gender has caused much soul searching in recent times.

title:LocalizableTitle.title:SummaryShort: Chosen by the National Assembly after his father's abdication, what would the future hold for ex-ballet dancer King Sihamoni?
title:LocalizableTitle.title:SummaryLong: Chosen by the National Assembly after his father's abdication, what would the future hold for ex-ballet dancer King Sihamoni?
title:LocalizableTitle.title:ActorDisplay: Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Alexander Skarsgrd, Rutina Wesley, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten, Nelsan Ellis, Carrie Preston

title:LocalizableTitle.title:SummaryShort: Chosen by the National Assembly after his father's abdication, what would the future hold for ex-ballet dancer King Sihamoni?

title:LocalizableTitle.title:SummaryShort: Asia's Monarchies are all unique, but there is one thing they all share in common - all are at a fascinating point in their various histories.
title:LocalizableTitle.title:SummaryLong: Asia's iconic monarchies, often condemned for stifling personal freedom and hampering social development by outsiders, stand as bastions of the nation's heart and soul for their people. Visiting Japan, Bhutan and Camboia, this series journeys to the heart of these beautiful lands and the monarchies that still remain.
title:LocalizableTitle.title:ActorDisplay: Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Alexander Skarsgrd, Rutina Wesley, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten, Nelsan Ellis, Carrie Preston
